sub_title: Artist painter at Self - Employed Artist
summary:
For more information about my exhibitions, awards, publications, etc.: www.rinekedejong.nl  or www.rinekedejongpainting.com
Visit for ordering cards, prints and posters: http://www.redbubble.com/people/rinekedejong  and http://rinekedejong.imagekind.com.

Since I was a little child I made drawings and I painted. Art has always been a passion. In my work I am using my imagination, my fantasy. This is my unique and own signature. I seek the beauty in people and not the ugliness. For me creating works of art is a form of love and that is wonderful.
I was trained and graduated as a fashion designer in Amsterdam and worked a couple of years in the fashion industry as a designer, but I preferred to be an art painter. I followed art classes at De Gooise Academie in Laren, The Netherlands. Meanwhile I worked as a technical designer, a did public relations for a bank and worked as a secretary and managing assistent. Furthermore I did (and still do) a lot of self study about acrylic and oilpainting with special interest in the old techniques from and recipes of the old masters. Now, for many years already, I give art classes myself.

“Rineke de Jong’s paintings are a fusion of pure painting and concrete figuration. The abstract phase is, purely intuitive, often painted hastily, resulting in a chaotic and evocative space. Figures arise amongst the chaos of color, which makes her painting complete. Her quest is exploring the compromise between abstract and figurative art. She also works in the old academic art of oilpainting.
Mythology is often the source of inspiration. She tries to achieve divinity and humanity in her paintings.
Rineke de Jong has often exhibitions in The Netherlands and abroad, such as in France, Germany, Italy, Ireland, the United Kingdom, Denmark, etc., and won many awards. She was invited and was present with her works of art at the Florence Biennale 2009.”

GRATIS TOEGANG

Vorig jaar trok de ADAF meer dan 5.500 bezoekers. Er werd al direct goed verkocht en als gevolg van de beurs zijn ook nog veel werken verkocht.

De ADAF heeft elk jaar een grotere aantrekkingskracht op serieuze kunstliefhebbers en –kopers. Door het grote aantal deelnemende kunstenaars biedt de meest professionele Nederlandse beurs voor kunstenaars, een grote variëteit aan hedendaagse kunst. Van figuratief tot abstract en van traditioneel tot progressief.
